rukus.text: jab soory lapet diya jaayega
aur jab taare dhumil ho jaayenge
jab parvat chalaaye jaayenge
aur jab das maheene kee gaabhin oontaniyaan chhod dee jaayengee
aur jab van pashu ekatr kar diye jaayenge
aur jab saagar bhadakaaye jaayenge
aur jab praan jod diye jaayenge
aur jab jeevit gaadee gayee kanya se prashn kiya jaayegaah
ki vah kis aparaadh ke kaaran vadh kee gayee
tatha jab karmapatr phaila diye jaayenge
aur jab aakaash kee khaal utaar dee jaayegee
aur jab narak dahakaee jaayegee
aur jab svarg sameep laee jaayegee
to pratyek praanee jaan lega ki vah kya lekar aaya hai
main shapath leta hoon un taaron kee, jo peechhe hat jaate hain
jo chalate-chalate chhup jaate hain
aur raat kee (shapath), jab samaapt hone lagatee hai
tatha bhor kee, jab ujaala hone lagata hai
ye (quraan) ek maanyavar svarg doot ka laaya hua kathan hai
jo shaktishaalee hai. arsh (sinhaasan) ke maalik ke paas uchch pad vaala hai
jisakee baat maanee jaatee hai aur bada amaanatadaar hai
aur tumhaara saathee unmat nahin hai
usane use aakaash mein khule roop se dekha hai
vah paroksh (gaib) kee baat bataane mein pralobhee nahin hai
ye dhikkaaree shaitaan ka kathan nahin hai
phir tum kahaan ja rahe ho
ye sansaar vaasiyon ke lie ek smrti (shaastr) hai
tumamen se usake lie, jo sudharana chaahata ho
tatha tum vishv ke paalanahaar ke chaahe bina kuchh nahin kar sakate
